# UITextField.BorderStyle

**Enumeration**

The type of border around the text field.

## Declaration

```swift
enum BorderStyle
```

## Constants

- **UITextField.BorderStyle.none**: The text field does not display a border.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.line**: Displays a thin rectangle around the text field.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.bezel**: Displays a bezel-style border for the text field. This style is typically used for standard data-entry fields.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.roundedRect**: Displays a rounded-style border for the text field.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring the text attributes

- **text**: The text that the text field displays.
- **attributedText**: The styled text that the text field displays.
- **placeholder**: The string that displays when there is no other text in the text field.
- **attributedPlaceholder**: The styled string that displays when there is no other text in the text field.
- **defaultTextAttributes**: The default attributes to apply to the text.
- **font**: The font of the text.
- **textColor**: The color of the text.
- **textAlignment**: The technique for aligning the text.
- **typingAttributes**: The attributes to apply to new text that the user enters.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
